name: ExternalCatheterOrUrinaryCollectionDevice
title: External Catheter or Urinary Collection Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: External urinary catheters - male, and external collection devices - female.),(Data Element Scope: External urinary catheter and urinary collection device medical equipment defined by Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services as required for review.),(Inclusion Criteria: External urinary catheters - male, and external collection devices - female.),(Exclusion Criteria: Other categories of external catheters or collection devices not elsewhere specified or not required for review by Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.)
